comment: * Class that holds information about a Font family.

variables.name: mLanguages
variables.comment: Comma separated BCP47 complient locale strings

variables.name: VARIANT_DEFAULT
variables.comment:
* Value for font variant.
         *
         * Indicates the font has no variant attribute.

variables.name: VARIANT_COMPACT
variables.comment:
* Value for font variant.
         *
         * Indicates the font is for compact variant.
         * @see android.graphics.Paint#setElegantTextHeight

variables.name: VARIANT_ELEGANT
variables.comment:
* Value for font variant.
         *
         * Indiates the font is for elegant variant.
         * @see android.graphics.Paint#setElegantTextHeight

methods.name: public String getName()
methods.comment: * Returns the name given by the system to this font family.

methods.name: public Font[] getFonts()
methods.comment: * Returns the list of fonts included in this family.

methods.name: public String getLanguages()
methods.comment: * Returns the comma separated BCP47 complient languages for this family. May be null.

methods.name: public int getVariant()
methods.comment: * Returns the font variant for this family, e.g. "elegant" or "compact". May be null.
